body:
*WARNING: LOTS OF DRAMA AND WORDS.*

Hey everyone.
I made this as a bit of an apology towards a friend of Steven's. It all happened really quickly and embarrassed myself. But I'm gonna be a man and step up to the plate instead of hiding my mistakes for somebody to find it.

I'm typing this on my iPod so I can't link the video, but I was saying some really mean things to Steven's friend which were caught on video. Rewatching it, I felt really bad. If you happen to come across it, just know what I said wasn't even close to true. Any of it. That day I had a lot of crap to deal with. I ran out of patience and was just completely tired. 

I would never bully someone like that (yes, it was obvious bullying) unless I had some huge motive. That isn't like me. He even titled the video "MLGtino insulting me". I seriously cannot stress how bad I feel about this.

You can demote me (I'm an interviewee) or ban me I really don't care. I just want to apologize for this. Especially to Steven and his friend.

Sorry if this seems like an attention drawing post, but I really just wanted to get this off my chest before somebody got the wrong idea.

Really sorry, 
~MLGtino

Everyone makes mistakes. I've had my fair share of days where I just want to strangle anyone that says anything even the slightest bit annoying.

Very nice of you to apologize like this :D

Glad you apologized. ;)
